sentences.sContent: The company voted to enfranchise its 120 women members.
sentences.sCn: 公司投票决定给予其120名女员工选举权。

synos.tran: 给予选举权；给予自治权；解放，释放

remMethod.val: en (使…) + franchise (公民权) → 使…有公民权 → 给予…公民权

trans.tranCn: 释放， 解放， 给予自由； 给予…公民权
trans.tranOther: to give a group of people the right to vote
